thread.section_title: Leo Hostel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Worth the Price
thread.title_full: Worth the Price - Review of Leo Hostel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: bradyrust
title: Worth the Price
text: Stayed here just one night before flying out of Beijing and it was well worth it. Good location for sightseeing and the city center, not necessarily for going to bars, clubbing/dancing. Cool vibe in the common areas, which include food and drinks. Met some cool Brits and Aussies. One well-traveled Aussie said this was his favorite hostel in the world. The only thing that made me hesitant about a full five stars was the quality of the mattress.
